properties.areaDesc: Wabash, IL; Daviess, IN; Knox, IN; Gibson, IN; Pike, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 6 at 11:10AM EST until January 8 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterway
in Indiana...

White River...

.Minor lowland flooding will continue in a few locations along the
lower White River.

A strong storm system may bring heavy rainfall back to the area by next weekend.
This could renew or enhance flooding early next week. Monitor forecasts later this week and weekend for possible rainfall amounts.

The Flood Warning continues for
The White River at Petersburg.
* until Wednesday morning.
* At 10:30 AM Monday the stage was 17.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It will continue to fall to below flood stage by Tuesday
evening.
* At 17.0 feet...Flooding affects low agricultural lands, low oil
fields and closes Bottoms Rd...Brothers Rd and East Govenors Road
in Knox County.  In agricultural season...farmers are concerned at
this stage.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
